title: Pattern Find
text:
Your task is so simple given a string and a pattern. You find the pattern on the given string. If found print how many time found the pattern and their index. Otherwise print ‘Not Found’.InputThe input   line consists of a number T (1 ≤ T ≤ 50) test cases.For each case given two string number  A,B. the string and the pattern  1 ≤ |A|, |B| ≤ 106All character will be lowercase Latin character.  And |  | is the length of string.OutputFor each case print the number  (found pattern from the given string) next line their positions. Otherwise print 'Not Found' without quotes.Output a blank line between two cases.ExampleInput:3
ababab ab
aaaaa bbb
aafafaasf aafOutput:3
1 3 5

Not Found

1
1Hints: Here all index is 1 based.
sample_input:
Input:3
ababab ab
aaaaa bbb
aafafaasf aafOutput:3
1 3 5

Not Found

1
1
